snippet.title: Winding Heat Arcade
snippet.description:
The rules are the same as Midnight Run, there courses Easy, Medium and Hard but this time the game it takes place on touge roads. 
Like MR you race on a single looped track against 3 rival cars competing for the first place,you can set the courses to be played without traffic by holding the break pedal on the select screen.
The game has now unlicensed 14 cars with 5 different tuning options,offering variety in both strategy and gameplay.

The cabinet came in two configurations: a sitdown version with a 50-inch monitor and an upright version with a 25-inch monitor. Cabinets can be linked to support up to four players.

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/InsertCoinArcadeOfficial/
Email: insertcoinarcade@outlook.it
Twitter: https://twitter.com/InsertCoinArcad
